title: Diet
text: An adult panda eats a massive 26–84 pounds (12–38 kg) of bamboo daily. They need to spend 10-16 hours eating!

title: Pooping
text: Since pandas eat a lot, they poop around 40 TIMES a day!

title: Newborns
text: Newborn pandas are REALLY small, the size of a stick of butter!

title: Sounds
text: Pandas don't roar! They make sounds like bleats, growls, and honks.
